name: Now That's Sport!
description:
Play your favourite sport, Sport, in this classic game of sport!

A local multiplayer game for up to 4 players.

Supports gamepad and keyboard controls.

Keyboard 1:
WASD - Move
F - Run
G - Kick Ball / Switch Active Player
H - Tackle
Enter - Start Game / Cancel Game

Keyboard 2:
Arrow Keys - Move
, (Comma) - Run
. (Period) - Kick Ball / Switch Active Player
/ (Slash) - Tackle
Enter - Start Game / Cancel Game

Gamepad controls are shown in-game.
